product_name: The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great protection for running in winter, The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for men regulates your temperature with wind-resistant fabric and a warm merino wool fabric blend. Wind-resistant front is flanked by stretchy, warm panels with FlashDry(TM) fibers around the sides, down the back and under the arms for great moisture management. Blend of merino wool, polyolefin and polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly and offers light insulation in the cold. When your hands need light protection in chilly weather, pull the mitts out from the internal cuffs and over your fingers. The half-zip neck provides extra coverage when fully zipped, or quick ventilation when unzipped; 2-way zipper lets you quickly ventilate while keeping your neck warm. Zippered chest pocket; shaped hem; thumbholes; reflective hits. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for men is part of the Flight Series(R) collection. Closeout.
short_description: Great protection for running in winter, The North Face Isotherm Half-Zip Top for men regulates your temperature with wind-resistant fabric and a warm merino wool fabric blend.
